Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class GameBoardCLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.GameBoardCLI
public class GameBoardCLI
extends java.lang.Object
Class GameBoardCLI contains methods to update the gameboard.
